org.fcrepo.jms

Class JMSTopicPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.jms.JMSTopicPublisher

  • public class JMSTopicPublisher
extends Object
    Machinery to publish JMS messages when an EventBus message is received.
    Author:
    barmintor, awoods
